package com.widgetfiles

import android.content.Context
import androidx.glance.GlanceId
import androidx.glance.GlanceModifier
import androidx.glance.appwidget.GlanceAppWidget
import androidx.glance.appwidget.appWidgetBackground
import androidx.glance.appwidget.provideContent
import androidx.glance.background
import androidx.glance.layout.*
import androidx.glance.text.Text
import androidx.glance.text.TextStyle
import androidx.glance.color.ColorProvider
import androidx.compose.ui.graphics.Color
import androidx.compose.runtime.Composable
import androidx.compose.ui.unit.dp
import androidx.compose.ui.unit.sp
import androidx.glance.text.FontFamily
import androidx.glance.text.FontWeight
import androidx.glance.unit.ColorProvider
import java.util.Calendar

class MyAppWidget : GlanceAppWidget() {
 override suspend fun provideGlance(context: Context, id: GlanceId) {
 provideContent {
 WidgetUI()
 }
 }

 data class Prayer(val name: String, val time: String)

 // Mocked prayer times provider
 private fun getPrayerTimes(): List<Prayer> = listOf(
 Prayer("Fajr", "05:00"),
 Prayer("Dhuhr", "12:30"),
 Prayer("Asr", "15:45"),
 Prayer("Maghrib", "18:20"),
 Prayer("Isha", "20:00")
 )

 // Dynamic color provider based on time
 private fun getDynamicColor(): ColorProvider {
 val hour = Calendar.getInstance().get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY)
 return when (hour) {
 in 5..11 -> ColorProvider(Color(0xFF81D4FA)) // Morning: light blue
 in 12..16 -> ColorProvider(Color(0xFFFFF176)) // Afternoon: yellow
 in 17..19 -> ColorProvider(Color(0xFFFF8A65)) // Evening: orange
 else -> ColorProvider(Color(0xFF424242)) // Night: dark gray
 }
 }

 @Composable
 private fun WidgetUI() {
 val prayers = getPrayerTimes()
 Box(
 modifier = GlanceModifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .appWidgetBackground()
 .background(getDynamicColor())
 ) {
 Column(
 modifier = GlanceModifier.fillMaxSize().padding(16.dp),
 horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally,
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 ) {
 Text(
 text = "Prayer Times",
 style = TextStyle(
 color = ColorProvider(Color.White),
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
 fontFamily = FontFamily("Cursive"),
 fontSize = 20.sp
 )
 )
 Spacer(modifier = GlanceModifier.height(8.dp))
 for (prayer in prayers) {
 Row(
 modifier = GlanceModifier.fillMaxWidth().padding(vertical = 2.dp),
 horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally
 ) {
 Text(
 text = prayer.name,
 style = TextStyle(color = ColorProvider(Color.White))
 )
 Spacer(modifier = GlanceModifier.defaultWeight())
 Text(
 text = prayer.time,
 style = TextStyle(color = ColorProvider(Color.White))
 )
 }
 }
 }
 }
 }
}

package com.widgetfiles

import android.content.Context
import androidx.compose.runtime.Composable
import androidx.datastore.preferences.core.Preferences
import androidx.datastore.preferences.core.booleanPreferencesKey
import androidx.datastore.preferences.core.edit
import androidx.glance.GlanceId
import androidx.glance.GlanceModifier
import androidx.glance.appwidget.GlanceAppWidget
import androidx.glance.appwidget.GlanceAppWidgetManager
import androidx.glance.appwidget.action.ActionCallback
import androidx.glance.appwidget.action.actionRunCallback
import androidx.glance.appwidget.state.updateAppWidgetState
import androidx.glance.background
import androidx.glance.layout.*
import androidx.glance.text.Text
import androidx.glance.text.TextStyle

import androidx.compose.ui.graphics.Color

import androidx.glance.text.FontWeight
import androidx.glance.unit.ColorProvider
import java.util.Calendar
import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit
import androidx.glance.state.PreferencesGlanceStateDefinition
import androidx.glance.appwidget.provideContent
import androidx.glance.currentState
import kotlinx.coroutines.Dispatchers
import kotlinx.coroutines.withContext

class MyAppWidget : GlanceAppWidget() {
 companion object {
 val MODE_KEY = booleanPreferencesKey("expanded_mode")
 }

 override val stateDefinition = PreferencesGlanceStateDefinition

 data class Prayer(val name: String, val time: String)

 private fun getPrayerTimes(): List<Prayer> = listOf(
 Prayer("Fajr", "05:00"),
 Prayer("Dhuhr", "12:30"),
 Prayer("Asr", "15:45"),
 Prayer("Maghrib", "18:20"),
 Prayer("Isha", "20:00")
 )

 private fun getCurrentAndNextPrayer(): Pair<Prayer, Prayer> {
 val nowMins = Calendar.getInstance().get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY) * 60 + Calendar.getInstance().get(Calendar.MINUTE)
 val prayers = getPrayerTimes()
 var current = prayers.first()
 var next = prayers.first()
 for (i in prayers.indices) {
 val mins = prayers[i].time.split(":").let { it[0].toInt() * 60 + it[1].toInt() }
 if (nowMins >= mins) current = prayers[i]
 if (nowMins < mins) {
 next = prayers[i]; break
 }
 }
 if (nowMins >= prayers.last().time.split(":").let { it[0].toInt() * 60 + it[1].toInt() }) next = prayers.first()
 return Pair(current, next)
 }

 private fun getDynamicColor(): ColorProvider {
 val hour = Calendar.getInstance().get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY)
 return when (hour) {
 in 5..11 -> ColorProvider(Color(0xFF81D4FA))
 in 12..16 -> ColorProvider(Color(0xFFFFF176))
 in 17..19 -> ColorProvider(Color(0xFFFF8A65))
 else -> ColorProvider(Color(0xFF424242))
 }
 }

 override suspend fun provideGlance(context: Context, id: GlanceId) {
 provideContent {
 WidgetUI()
 }
 }

 @Composable
 private fun WidgetUI() {
 val prefs = currentState<Preferences>()
 val expanded = prefs[MODE_KEY] ?: false
 Box(
 modifier = GlanceModifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .background(getDynamicColor()),
 onClick = actionRunCallback<ToggleModeAction>()
 ) {
 if (!expanded) {
 val (currentPrayer, nextPrayer) = getCurrentAndNextPrayer()
 val now = Calendar.getInstance()
 val nextDb = nextPrayer.time.split(":")
 val calNext = Calendar.getInstance().apply {
 set(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY, nextDb[0].toInt())
 set(Calendar.MINUTE, nextDb[1].toInt())
 set(Calendar.SECOND, 0)
 set(Calendar.MILLISECOND, 0)
 if (get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY) * 60 + get(Calendar.MINUTE) <=
 now.get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY) * 60 + now.get(Calendar.MINUTE)
 ) add(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH, 1)
 }
 val diffMillis = calNext.timeInMillis - now.timeInMillis
 val hoursLeft = TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.toHours(diffMillis)
 val minsLeft = TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.toMinutes(diffMillis) % 60
 val secsLeft = TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.toSeconds(diffMillis) % 60
 val remainingStr = String.format("%02d:%02d:%02d", hoursLeft, minsLeft, secsLeft)
 Column(
 modifier = GlanceModifier.fillMaxSize().padding(16.dp),
 horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally,
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 ) {
 Text(
 text = "Current: ${currentPrayer.name}",
 style = TextStyle(color = ColorProvider(Color.White), fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold, fontSize = 22.sp)
 )
 Spacer(modifier = GlanceModifier.height(10.dp))
 Text(
 text = "Next: ${nextPrayer.name} (${nextPrayer.time})",
 style = TextStyle(color = ColorProvider(Color.White), fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium, fontSize = 18.sp)
 )
 Spacer(modifier = GlanceModifier.height(10.dp))
 Text(
 text = remainingStr,
 style = TextStyle(color = ColorProvider(Color.White), fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold, fontSize = 32.sp)
 )
 Spacer(modifier = GlanceModifier.height(14.dp))
 Text(
 text = "Tap to show all prayers",
 style = TextStyle(color = ColorProvider(Color.LightGray), fontSize = 12.sp)
 )
 }
 } else {
 val prayers = getPrayerTimes()
 Column(
 modifier = GlanceModifier.fillMaxSize().padding(14.dp),
 horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally,
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 ) {
 prayers.forEachIndexed { i, prayer ->
 Row(
 modifier = GlanceModifier.fillMaxWidth().padding(vertical = 6.dp),
 horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally
 ) {
 Text(
 text = prayer.name,
 style = TextStyle(color = ColorProvider(Color.White), fontSize = 18.sp, fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium)
 )
 Spacer(modifier = GlanceModifier.defaultWeight())
 Text(
 text = prayer.time,
 style = TextStyle(color = ColorProvider(Color.White), fontSize = 18.sp, fontWeight = FontWeight.Normal)
 )
 }
 if (i < prayers.lastIndex) {
 Spacer(
 modifier = GlanceModifier.fillMaxWidth().height(1.dp).background(ColorProvider(Color.LightGray))
 )
 }
 }
 Spacer(modifier = GlanceModifier.height(10.dp))
 Text(
 text = "Tap to return to current prayer",
 style = TextStyle(color = ColorProvider(Color.LightGray), fontSize = 12.sp)
 )
 }
 }
 }
 }
}

class ToggleModeAction : ActionCallback {
 override suspend fun onAction(
 context: Context,
 glanceId: GlanceId,
 parameters: ActionParameters
 ) {
 updateAppWidgetState(context, PreferencesGlanceStateDefinition, glanceId) { prefs ->
 val newPrefs = prefs.toMutablePreferences()
 val prev = newPrefs[MyAppWidget.MODE_KEY] ?: false
 newPrefs[MyAppWidget.MODE_KEY] = !prev
 newPrefs
 }
 // Widget update handled automatically
 }
}

 private fun getStoredLocation(context: Context): Pair<Double, Double>? {

 return if (lat != null && lon != null) (lat to lon) else null
 }
 private fun setStoredLocation(context: Context, lat: Double, lon: Double, timeMillis: Long) {
 val prefs = context.getSharedPreferences("adhan_widget_prefs", Context.MODE_PRIVATE)
 prefs.edit()
 .putString("adhan_lat", lat.toString())
 .putString("adhan_lon", lon.toString())
 .putLong("adhan_last_time", timeMillis)
 .apply()
 }

 private fun getLastLocationTime(context: Context): Long {
 val prefs = context.getSharedPreferences("adhan_widget_prefs", Context.MODE_PRIVATE)
 return prefs.getLong("adhan_last_time", 0)
 }

 private fun getPrayerTimesSmart(context: Context): List<Prayer> {
 val now = System.currentTimeMillis()
 val stored = getStoredLocation(context)
 val lastTime = getLastLocationTime(context)
 val lat = stored?.first ?: 40.7128
 val lon = stored?.second ?: -74.0060
 // The following code is commented to avoid direct FusedLocationProvider usage in widget code
 // If needUpdate and permission: fetch location externally and update stored value
 val coordinates = Coordinates(lat, lon)
 val params = CalculationParameters(CalculationMethod.NORTH_AMERICA, Madhab.HANAFI)
 val date = Date()

 return listOf(
 Prayer("Fajr", pt.fajr.timeString()),
 Prayer("Dhuhr", pt.dhuhr.timeString()),
 Prayer("Asr", pt.asr.timeString()),
 Prayer("Maghrib", pt.maghrib.timeString()),
 Prayer("Isha", pt.isha.timeString())
 )
 }

 override suspend fun provideGlance(context: Context, id: GlanceId) {
 val prayers = getPrayerTimesSmart(context)
 provideContent {
 WidgetUI(prayers)
 }
 }

 private fun WidgetUI(prayers: List<Prayer>) {
 val prefs = currentState<Preferences>()
 val expanded = prefs[MODE_KEY] ?: false
 Box(
 modifier = GlanceModifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .background(getDynamicColor())

 if (!expanded) {
 val (currentPrayer, nextPrayer) = getCurrentAndNextPrayer(prayers)

 set(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY, nextDb[0].toInt())
 set(Calendar.MINUTE, nextDb[1].toInt())
 set(Calendar.SECOND, 0)
 set(Calendar.MILLISECOND, 0)
 if (get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY) * 60 + get(Calendar.MINUTE) <=
 now.get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY) * 60 + now.get(Calendar.MINUTE)
 ) add(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH, 1)
 }
 val diffMillis = calNext.timeInMillis - now.timeInMillis
 val hoursLeft = TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.toHours(diffMillis)
 val minsLeft = TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.toMinutes(diffMillis) % 60
 val secsLeft = TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.toSeconds(diffMillis) % 60
 val remainingStr = String.format("%02d:%02d:%02d", hoursLeft, minsLeft, secsLeft)

 private fun getCurrentAndNextPrayer(prayers: List<Prayer>): Pair<Prayer, Prayer> {
 val now = Calendar.getInstance()
 val nowMins = now.get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY) * 60 + now.get(Calendar.MINUTE)
 var current = prayers.first()
 var next = prayers.first()
 for (i in prayers.indices) {
 val mins = prayers[i].time.split(":").let { it[0].toInt() * 60 + it[1].toInt() }
 if (nowMins >= mins) current = prayers[i]
 if (nowMins < mins) {
 next = prayers[i]; break
 }
 }
 if (nowMins >= prayers.last().time.split(":")
 .let { it[0].toInt() * 60 + it[1].toInt() }
 ) next = prayers.first()
 return current to next
 }

 private fun getDynamicColor(): ColorProvider {
 val hour = Calendar.getInstance().get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY)
 return when (hour) {
 in 5..11 -> ColorProvider(Color(0xFF81D4FA))
 in 12..16 -> ColorProvider(Color(0xFFFFF176))
 in 17..19 -> ColorProvider(Color(0xFFFF8A65))
 else -> ColorProvider(Color(0xFF424242))
 }
 }

 val lat = prefs.getString("adhan_lat", null)?.toDoubleOrNull()

 }
 private fun setStoredLocation(context: Context, lat: Double, lon: Double, timeMillis: Long) {

 .putString("adhan_lat", lat.toString())
 .putString("adhan_lon", lon.toString())
 .putLong("adhan_last_time", timeMillis)
 .apply()
 }

 private fun getLastLocationTime(context: Context): Long {

 return prefs.getLong("adhan_last_time", 0)
 }

 private fun getPrayerTimesSmart(context: Context): List<Prayer> {
 val now = System.currentTimeMillis()
 val stored = getStoredLocation(context)
 val lastTime = getLastLocationTime(context)
 val lat = stored?.first ?: 40.7128
 val lon = stored?.second ?: -74.0060
 // The following code is commented to avoid direct FusedLocationProvider usage in widget code

 val coordinates = Coordinates(lat, lon)
 val params = CalculationParameters(CalculationMethod.NORTH_AMERICA, Madhab.HANAFI)
 val date = Date()
 val pt = PrayerTimes(coordinates, date, params)
 return listOf(
 Prayer("Fajr", pt.fajr.timeString()),
 Prayer("Dhuhr", pt.dhuhr.timeString()),
 Prayer("Asr", pt.asr.timeString()),
 Prayer("Maghrib", pt.maghrib.timeString()),
 Prayer("Isha", pt.isha.timeString())
 )
 }

 override suspend fun provideGlance(context: Context, id: GlanceId) {
 val prayers = getPrayerTimesSmart(context)
 provideContent {
 WidgetUI(prayers)
 }
 }

 @Composable
 private fun WidgetUI(prayers: List<Prayer>) {
 val prefs = currentState<Preferences>()
 val expanded = prefs[MODE_KEY] ?: false
 Box(
 modifier = GlanceModifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .background(getDynamicColor())
 .clickable(actionRunCallback<ToggleModeAction>())
 ) {
 if (!expanded) {
 val (currentPrayer, nextPrayer) = getCurrentAndNextPrayer(prayers)
 val now = Calendar.getInstance()
 val nextDb = nextPrayer.time.split(":")
 val calNext = Calendar.getInstance().apply {
 set(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY, nextDb[0].toInt())
 set(Calendar.MINUTE, nextDb[1].toInt())
 set(Calendar.SECOND, 0)
 set(Calendar.MILLISECOND, 0)
 if (get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY) * 60 + get(Calendar.MINUTE) <=
 now.get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY) * 60 + now.get(Calendar.MINUTE)
 ) add(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH, 1)
 }
 val diffMillis = calNext.timeInMillis - now.timeInMillis
 val hoursLeft = TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.toHours(diffMillis)
 val minsLeft = TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.toMinutes(diffMillis) % 60
 val secsLeft = TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.toSeconds(diffMillis) % 60
 val remainingStr = String.format("%02d:%02d:%02d", hoursLeft, minsLeft, secsLeft)
 Column(
 modifier = GlanceModifier.fillMaxSize().padding(16.dp),
 horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally,
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 ) {
 Text(
 text = "Current: ${currentPrayer.name}",
 style = TextStyle(color = ColorProvider(Color.White), fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold, fontSize = 22.sp)
 )
 Spacer(modifier = GlanceModifier.height(10.dp))
 Text(
 text = "Next: ${nextPrayer.name} (${nextPrayer.time})",
 style = TextStyle(color = ColorProvider(Color.White), fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium, fontSize = 18.sp)
 )
 Spacer(modifier = GlanceModifier.height(10.dp))
 Text(
 text = remainingStr,
 style = TextStyle(color = ColorProvider(Color.White), fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold, fontSize = 32.sp)
 )
 Spacer(modifier = GlanceModifier.height(14.dp))
 Text(
 text = "Tap to show all prayers",
 style = TextStyle(color = ColorProvider(Color.LightGray), fontSize = 12.sp)
 )
 }
 } else {
 Column(
 modifier = GlanceModifier.fillMaxSize().padding(14.dp),
 horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally,
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 ) {
 prayers.forEachIndexed { i, prayer ->
 Row(
 modifier = GlanceModifier.fillMaxWidth().padding(vertical = 6.dp),
 horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally
 ) {
 Text(
 text = prayer.name,
 style = TextStyle(color = ColorProvider(Color.White), fontSize = 18.sp, fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium)
 )
 Spacer(modifier = GlanceModifier.defaultWeight())
 Text(
 text = prayer.time,
 style = TextStyle(color = ColorProvider(Color.White), fontSize = 18.sp, fontWeight = FontWeight.Normal)
 )
 }
 if (i < prayers.lastIndex) {
 Spacer(
 modifier = GlanceModifier.fillMaxWidth().height(1.dp).background(ColorProvider(Color.LightGray))
 )
 }
 }
 Spacer(modifier = GlanceModifier.height(10.dp))
 Text(
 text = "Tap to return to current prayer",
 style = TextStyle(color = ColorProvider(Color.LightGray), fontSize = 12.sp)
 )
 }
 }
 }
 }

 private fun getCurrentAndNextPrayer(prayers: List<Prayer>): Pair<Prayer, Prayer> {
 val now = Calendar.getInstance()
 val nowMins = now.get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY) * 60 + now.get(Calendar.MINUTE)
 var current = prayers.first()
 var next = prayers.first()
 for (i in prayers.indices) {
 val mins = prayers[i].time.split(":").let { it[0].toInt() * 60 + it[1].toInt() }
 if (nowMins >= mins) current = prayers[i]
 if (nowMins < mins) {
 next = prayers[i]; break
 }
 }
 if (nowMins >= prayers.last().time.split(":")
 .let { it[0].toInt() * 60 + it[1].toInt() }
 ) next = prayers.first()
 return current to next
 }

 private fun getDynamicColor(): ColorProvider {
 val hour = Calendar.getInstance().get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY)
 return when (hour) {
 in 5..11 -> ColorProvider(Color(0xFF81D4FA))
 in 12..16 -> ColorProvider(Color(0xFFFFF176))
 in 17..19 -> ColorProvider(Color(0xFFFF8A65))
 else -> ColorProvider(Color(0xFF424242))
 }
 }

import kotlinx.coroutines.Dispatchers
import kotlinx.coroutines.withContext
import androidx.glance.clickable
import androidx.glance.unit.ColorProvider

class MyAppWidget : GlanceAppWidget() {
 companion object {
 val MODE_KEY = booleanPreferencesKey("expanded_mode")
 }

 override val stateDefinition = PreferencesGlanceStateDefinition

 data class Prayer(val name: String, val time: String)

 private fun getStoredLocation(context: Context): Pair<Double, Double>? {
 val prefs = context.getSharedPreferences("adhan_widget_prefs", Context.MODE_PRIVATE)
 val lat = prefs.getString("adhan_lat", null)?.toDoubleOrNull()
 val lon = prefs.getString("adhan_lon", null)?.toDoubleOrNull()
 return if (lat != null && lon != null) (lat to lon) else null
 }
 private fun setStoredLocation(context: Context, lat: Double, lon: Double, timeMillis: Long) {
 val prefs = context.getSharedPreferences("adhan_widget_prefs", Context.MODE_PRIVATE)
 prefs.edit()
 .putString("adhan_lat", lat.toString())
 .putString("adhan_lon", lon.toString())
 .putLong("adhan_last_time", timeMillis)
 .apply()
 }

 private fun getLastLocationTime(context: Context): Long {
 val prefs = context.getSharedPreferences("adhan_widget_prefs", Context.MODE_PRIVATE)
 return prefs.getLong("adhan_last_time", 0)
 }

 private fun getPrayerTimesSmart(context: Context): List<Prayer> {
 val now = System.currentTimeMillis()
 val stored = getStoredLocation(context)
 val lastTime = getLastLocationTime(context)
 val lat = stored?.first ?: 40.7128
 val lon = stored?.second ?: -74.0060
 // The following code is commented to avoid direct FusedLocationProvider usage in widget code
 // If needUpdate and permission: fetch location externally and update stored value
 val coordinates = Coordinates(lat, lon)
 val params = CalculationParameters(CalculationMethod.NORTH_AMERICA, Madhab.HANAFI)
 val date = Date()
 val pt = PrayerTimes(coordinates, date, params)
 return listOf(
 Prayer("Fajr", pt.fajr.timeString()),
 Prayer("Dhuhr", pt.dhuhr.timeString()),
 Prayer("Asr", pt.asr.timeString()),
 Prayer("Maghrib", pt.maghrib.timeString()),
 Prayer("Isha", pt.isha.timeString())
 )
 }

 override suspend fun provideGlance(context: Context, id: GlanceId) {
 val prayers = getPrayerTimesSmart(context)
 provideContent {
 WidgetUI(prayers)
 }
 }

 @Composable
 private fun WidgetUI(prayers: List<Prayer>) {
 val prefs = currentState<Preferences>()
 val expanded = prefs[MODE_KEY] ?: false
 Box(
 modifier = GlanceModifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .background(getDynamicColor())
 .clickable(actionRunCallback<ToggleModeAction>())
 ) {
 if (!expanded) {
 val (currentPrayer, nextPrayer) = getCurrentAndNextPrayer(prayers)
 val now = Calendar.getInstance()
 val nextDb = nextPrayer.time.split(":")
 val calNext = Calendar.getInstance().apply {
 set(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY, nextDb[0].toInt())
 set(Calendar.MINUTE, nextDb[1].toInt())
 set(Calendar.SECOND, 0)
 set(Calendar.MILLISECOND, 0)
 if (get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY) * 60 + get(Calendar.MINUTE) <=
 now.get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY) * 60 + now.get(Calendar.MINUTE)
 ) add(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH, 1)
 }
 val diffMillis = calNext.timeInMillis - now.timeInMillis
 val hoursLeft = TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.toHours(diffMillis)
 val minsLeft = TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.toMinutes(diffMillis) % 60
 val secsLeft = TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.toSeconds(diffMillis) % 60
 val remainingStr = String.format("%02d:%02d:%02d", hoursLeft, minsLeft, secsLeft)
 Column(
 modifier = GlanceModifier.fillMaxSize().padding(16.dp),
 horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally,
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 ) {
 Text(
 text = "Current: ${currentPrayer.name}",
 style = TextStyle(color = ColorProvider(Color.White), fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold, fontSize = 22.sp)
 )
 Spacer(modifier = GlanceModifier.height(10.dp))
 Text(
 text = "Next: ${nextPrayer.name} (${nextPrayer.time})",
 style = TextStyle(color = ColorProvider(Color.White), fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium, fontSize = 18.sp)
 )
 Spacer(modifier = GlanceModifier.height(10.dp))
 Text(
 text = remainingStr,
 style = TextStyle(color = ColorProvider(Color.White), fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold, fontSize = 32.sp)
 )
 Spacer(modifier = GlanceModifier.height(14.dp))
 Text(
 text = "Tap to show all prayers",
 style = TextStyle(color = ColorProvider(Color.LightGray), fontSize = 12.sp)
 )
 }
 } else {
 Column(
 modifier = GlanceModifier.fillMaxSize().padding(14.dp),
 horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally,
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 ) {
 prayers.forEachIndexed { i, prayer ->
 Row(
 modifier = GlanceModifier.fillMaxWidth().padding(vertical = 6.dp),
 horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally
 ) {
 Text(
 text = prayer.name,
 style = TextStyle(color = ColorProvider(Color.White), fontSize = 18.sp, fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium)
 )
 Spacer(modifier = GlanceModifier.defaultWeight())
 Text(
 text = prayer.time,
 style = TextStyle(color = ColorProvider(Color.White), fontSize = 18.sp, fontWeight = FontWeight.Normal)
 )
 }
 if (i < prayers.lastIndex) {
 Spacer(
 modifier = GlanceModifier.fillMaxWidth().height(1.dp).background(ColorProvider(Color.LightGray))
 )
 }
 }
 Spacer(modifier = GlanceModifier.height(10.dp))
 Text(
 text = "Tap to return to current prayer",
 style = TextStyle(color = ColorProvider(Color.LightGray), fontSize = 12.sp)
 )
 }
 }
 }
 }

 private fun getCurrentAndNextPrayer(prayers: List<Prayer>): Pair<Prayer, Prayer> {
 val now = Calendar.getInstance()
 val nowMins = now.get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY) * 60 + now.get(Calendar.MINUTE)
 var current = prayers.first()
 var next = prayers.first()
 for (i in prayers.indices) {
 val mins = prayers[i].time.split(":").let { it[0].toInt() * 60 + it[1].toInt() }
 if (nowMins >= mins) current = prayers[i]
 if (nowMins < mins) {
 next = prayers[i]; break
 }
 }
 if (nowMins >= prayers.last().time.split(":")
 .let { it[0].toInt() * 60 + it[1].toInt() }
 ) next = prayers.first()
 return current to next
 }

 private fun getDynamicColor(): ColorProvider {
 val hour = Calendar.getInstance().get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY)
 return when (hour) {
 in 5..11 -> ColorProvider(Color(0xFF81D4FA))
 in 12..16 -> ColorProvider(Color(0xFFFFF176))
 in 17..19 -> ColorProvider(Color(0xFFFF8A65))
 else -> ColorProvider(Color(0xFF424242))
 }
 }
}

class ToggleModeAction : ActionCallback {
 override suspend fun onAction(
 context: Context,
 glanceId: GlanceId,
 parameters: ActionParameters
 ) {
 updateAppWidgetState(context, PreferencesGlanceStateDefinition, glanceId) { prefs ->
 val newPrefs = prefs.toMutablePreferences()
 val prev = newPrefs[MyAppWidget.MODE_KEY] ?: false
 newPrefs[MyAppWidget.MODE_KEY] = !prev
 newPrefs
 }
 // Widget update handled automatically
 }
}

class MyAppWidget : GlanceAppWidget() {
 companion object {
 val MODE_KEY = booleanPreferencesKey("expanded_mode")
 }

 override val stateDefinition = PreferencesGlanceStateDefinition

 data class Prayer(val name: String, val time: String)

 private fun getStoredLocation(context: Context): Pair<Double, Double>? {
 val prefs = context.getSharedPreferences("adhan_widget_prefs", Context.MODE_PRIVATE)
 val lat = prefs.getString("adhan_lat", null)?.toDoubleOrNull()
 val lon = prefs.getString("adhan_lon", null)?.toDoubleOrNull()
 return if (lat != null && lon != null) (lat to lon) else null
 }
 private fun setStoredLocation(context: Context, lat: Double, lon: Double, timeMillis: Long) {
 val prefs = context.getSharedPreferences("adhan_widget_prefs", Context.MODE_PRIVATE)
 prefs.edit()
 .putString("adhan_lat", lat.toString())
 .putString("adhan_lon", lon.toString())
 .putLong("adhan_last_time", timeMillis)
 .apply()
 }

 private fun getLastLocationTime(context: Context): Long {
 val prefs = context.getSharedPreferences("adhan_widget_prefs", Context.MODE_PRIVATE)
 return prefs.getLong("adhan_last_time", 0)
 }

 private fun getPrayerTimesSmart(context: Context): List<Prayer> {
 val now = System.currentTimeMillis()
 val stored = getStoredLocation(context)
 val lastTime = getLastLocationTime(context)
 val lat = stored?.first ?: 40.7128
 val lon = stored?.second ?: -74.0060
 // The following code is commented to avoid direct FusedLocationProvider usage in widget code
 // If needUpdate and permission: fetch location externally and update stored value
 val coordinates = Coordinates(lat, lon)
 val params = CalculationParameters(CalculationMethod.NORTH_AMERICA, Madhab.HANAFI)
 val date = Date()
 val pt = PrayerTimes(coordinates, date, params)
 return listOf(
 Prayer("Fajr", pt.fajr.timeString()),
 Prayer("Dhuhr", pt.dhuhr.timeString()),
 Prayer("Asr", pt.asr.timeString()),
 Prayer("Maghrib", pt.maghrib.timeString()),
 Prayer("Isha", pt.isha.timeString())
 )
 }

 override suspend fun provideGlance(context: Context, id: GlanceId) {
 val prayers = getPrayerTimesSmart(context)
 provideContent {
 WidgetUI(prayers)
 }
 }

 @Composable
 private fun WidgetUI(prayers: List<Prayer>) {
 val prefs = currentState<Preferences>()
 val expanded = prefs[MODE_KEY] ?: false
 Box(
 modifier = GlanceModifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .background(getDynamicColor())
 .clickable(actionRunCallback<ToggleModeAction>())
 ) {
 if (!expanded) {
 val (currentPrayer, nextPrayer) = getCurrentAndNextPrayer(prayers)
 val now = Calendar.getInstance()
 val nextDb = nextPrayer.time.split(":")
 val calNext = Calendar.getInstance().apply {
 set(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY, nextDb[0].toInt())
 set(Calendar.MINUTE, nextDb[1].toInt())
 set(Calendar.SECOND, 0)
 set(Calendar.MILLISECOND, 0)
 if (get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY) * 60 + get(Calendar.MINUTE) <=
 now.get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY) * 60 + now.get(Calendar.MINUTE)
 ) add(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH, 1)
 }
 val diffMillis = calNext.timeInMillis - now.timeInMillis
 val hoursLeft = TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.toHours(diffMillis)
 val minsLeft = TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.toMinutes(diffMillis) % 60
 val secsLeft = TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS.toSeconds(diffMillis) % 60
 val remainingStr = String.format("%02d:%02d:%02d", hoursLeft, minsLeft, secsLeft)
 Column(
 modifier = GlanceModifier.fillMaxSize().padding(16.dp),
 horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally,
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 ) {
 Text(
 text = "Current: ${currentPrayer.name}",
 style = TextStyle(color = ColorProvider(Color.White), fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold, fontSize = 22.sp)
 )
 Spacer(modifier = GlanceModifier.height(10.dp))
 Text(
 text = "Next: ${nextPrayer.name} (${nextPrayer.time})",
 style = TextStyle(color = ColorProvider(Color.White), fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium, fontSize = 18.sp)
 )
 Spacer(modifier = GlanceModifier.height(10.dp))
 Text(
 text = remainingStr,
 style = TextStyle(color = ColorProvider(Color.White), fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold, fontSize = 32.sp)
 )
 Spacer(modifier = GlanceModifier.height(14.dp))
 Text(
 text = "Tap to show all prayers",
 style = TextStyle(color = ColorProvider(Color.LightGray), fontSize = 12.sp)
 )
 }
 } else {
 Column(
 modifier = GlanceModifier.fillMaxSize().padding(14.dp),
 horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally,
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 ) {
 prayers.forEachIndexed { i, prayer ->
 Row(
 modifier = GlanceModifier.fillMaxWidth().padding(vertical = 6.dp),
 horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally
 ) {
 Text(
 text = prayer.name,
 style = TextStyle(color = ColorProvider(Color.White), fontSize = 18.sp, fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium)
 )
 Spacer(modifier = GlanceModifier.defaultWeight())
 Text(
 text = prayer.time,
 style = TextStyle(color = ColorProvider(Color.White), fontSize = 18.sp, fontWeight = FontWeight.Normal)
 )
 }
 if (i < prayers.lastIndex) {
 Spacer(
 modifier = GlanceModifier.fillMaxWidth().height(1.dp).background(ColorProvider(Color.LightGray))
 )
 }
 }
 Spacer(modifier = GlanceModifier.height(10.dp))
 Text(
 text = "Tap to return to current prayer",
 style = TextStyle(color = ColorProvider(Color.LightGray), fontSize = 12.sp)
 )
 }
 }
 }
 }

 private fun getCurrentAndNextPrayer(prayers: List<Prayer>): Pair<Prayer, Prayer> {
 val now = Calendar.getInstance()
 val nowMins = now.get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY) * 60 + now.get(Calendar.MINUTE)
 var current = prayers.first()
 var next = prayers.first()
 for (i in prayers.indices) {
 val mins = prayers[i].time.split(":").let { it[0].toInt() * 60 + it[1].toInt() }
 if (nowMins >= mins) current = prayers[i]
 if (nowMins < mins) {
 next = prayers[i]; break
 }
 }
 if (nowMins >= prayers.last().time.split(":")
 .let { it[0].toInt() * 60 + it[1].toInt() }
 ) next = prayers.first()
 return current to next
 }

 private fun getDynamicColor(): ColorProvider {
 val hour = Calendar.getInstance().get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY)
 return when (hour) {
 in 5..11 -> ColorProvider(Color(0xFF81D4FA))
 in 12..16 -> ColorProvider(Color(0xFFFFF176))
 in 17..19 -> ColorProvider(Color(0xFFFF8A65))
 else -> ColorProvider(Color(0xFF424242))
 }
 }
}

class ToggleModeAction : ActionCallback {
 override suspend fun onAction(
 context: Context,
 glanceId: GlanceId,
 parameters: ActionParameters
 ) {
 updateAppWidgetState(context, PreferencesGlanceStateDefinition, glanceId) { prefs ->
 val newPrefs = prefs.toMutablePreferences()
 val prev = newPrefs[MyAppWidget.MODE_KEY] ?: false
 newPrefs[MyAppWidget.MODE_KEY] = !prev
 newPrefs
 }
 // Widget update handled automatically
 }
}

 private fun getCurrentAndNextPrayer(prayers: List<Prayer>): Pair<Prayer, Prayer> {
 val now = Calendar.getInstance()
 val nowMins = now.get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY) * 60 + now.get(Calendar.MINUTE)
 var current = prayers.first()
 var next = prayers.first()
 for (i in prayers.indices) {
 val mins = prayers[i].time.split(":").let { it[0].toInt() * 60 + it[1].toInt() }
 if (nowMins >= mins) current = prayers[i]
 if (nowMins < mins) {
 next = prayers[i]; break
 }
 }
 if (nowMins >= prayers.last().time.split(":")
 .let { it[0].toInt() * 60 + it[1].toInt() }
 ) next = prayers.first()
 return current to next
 }

 in 17..19 -> ColorProvider(Color(0xFFFF8A65))
 else -> ColorProvider(Color(0xFF424242))
 }
 }

 var next = prayers.first()

 ) next = prayers.first()
 return current to next
 }

 style = TextStyle(
 color = ColorProvider(Color.White),
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
 fontSize = 16.sp
 )
 )
 Spacer(modifier = GlanceModifier.height(3.dp))
 Text(
 text = prayer.time,
 style = TextStyle(
 color = ColorProvider(Color(0xFFB3C6FF)),
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
 fontSize = 15.sp
 )
 )
 }
 }
 }
 }
 // else: show only background (blank widget)
 }
 }

 private fun getDynamicColor(): ColorProvider {

 }

package com.widgetfiles

import android.content.Context
import androidx.compose.runtime.Composable
import androidx.glance.GlanceModifier
import androidx.glance.appwidget.GlanceAppWidget
import androidx.glance.appwidget.provideContent
import androidx.glance.background
import androidx.glance.layout.*
import androidx.glance.text.Text
import androidx.glance.text.TextStyle
import androidx.glance.text.FontWeight
import androidx.glance.unit.ColorProvider
import androidx.compose.ui.graphics.Color
import androidx.compose.ui.unit.dp
import androidx.compose.ui.unit.sp
import java.util.Calendar

class MyAppWidget : GlanceAppWidget() {
 data class Prayer(val name: String, val time: String, val icon: String)

 private fun getPrayerTimesSmart(context: Context): List<Prayer> {
 // Add an emoji for each prayer
 return listOf(
 Prayer("Fajr", "05:00", ""), // dawn/sunrise
 Prayer("Dhuhr", "12:30", "☀️"), // midday sun
 Prayer("Asr", "15:45", "\uD83D\uDD57"), // clock
 Prayer("Maghrib", "18:20", ""), // sunset
 Prayer("Isha", "20:00", "") // moon/night
 )
 }

 override suspend fun provideGlance(context: Context, id: androidx.glance.GlanceId) {
 provideContent {
 WidgetUI(getPrayerTimesSmart(context))
 }
 }

 @Composable
 private fun WidgetUI(prayers: List<Prayer>) {
 val (current, next) = getCurrentAndNextPrayer(prayers)
 // You can use either "current" or "next" below:
 val display = next
 Box(
 modifier = GlanceModifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .background(getDynamicColor())
 .padding(18.dp),
 contentAlignment = Alignment.Center
 ) {
 Column(
 modifier = GlanceModifier.wrapContentSize(),
 horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally,
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 ) {
 Text(
 text = display.icon,
 style = TextStyle(fontSize = 54.sp, color = ColorProvider(Color.White))
 )
 Spacer(modifier = GlanceModifier.height(7.dp))
 Text(
 text = display.name,
 style = TextStyle(
 color = ColorProvider(Color.White),
 fontSize = 34.sp,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold
 // You can also try fontFamily = FontFamily("cursive") for extra roundness
 )
 )
 Spacer(modifier = GlanceModifier.height(6.dp))
 Text(
 text = display.time,
 style = TextStyle(
 color = ColorProvider(Color(0xFFD3E6F6)),
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
 fontSize = 26.sp
 )
 )
 }
 }
 }

 private fun getCurrentAndNextPrayer(prayers: List<Prayer>): Pair<Prayer, Prayer> {
 val now = Calendar.getInstance()
 val nowMins = now.get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY) * 60 + now.get(Calendar.MINUTE)
 var current = prayers.first()
 var next = prayers.first()
 for (i in prayers.indices) {
 val mins = prayers[i].time.split(":").let { it[0].toInt() * 60 + it[1].toInt() }
 if (nowMins >= mins) current = prayers[i]
 if (nowMins < mins) {
 next = prayers[i]; break
 }
 }
 if (nowMins >= prayers.last().time.split(":").let { it[0].toInt() * 60 + it[1].toInt() }) next = prayers.first()
 return current to next
 }

 private fun getDynamicColor(): ColorProvider {
 val hour = Calendar.getInstance().get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY)
 return when (hour) {
 in 5..11 -> ColorProvider(Color(0xFF81D4FA)) // Morning blue
 in 12..16 -> ColorProvider(Color(0xFFFFF176)) // Noon/afternoon yellow
 in 17..19 -> ColorProvider(Color(0xFFFF8A65)) // Sunset orange
 else -> ColorProvider(Color(0xFF232531)) // Night dark
 }
 }
}
